name: Infection (Ard Happiness Lab)
description:
Don't let a virus infect your beloved lungs! 

Protect your respiratory system by pushing the virus away. Well, of course it isn't as simple as that. Beware of the gas that your lungs inhale, otherwise you will mess with the deadly virus. 

Collect some bonuses to accelerate your score, yet don't forget to pay attention to some traps that may appear anytime. 

Good Luck. 

Stay healthy, stay safe, stay happy.
